issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
When the Electric Company app is first opened, there is a scrollable view nested within a ScrollView, and the parent ScrollView is unresponsive to touches until the ScrollableView has been swiped. Only then can you actually scroll to the rest of the ScrollView. 

Steps to Reproduce:
-Open Electric Company app
-Attempt to scroll vertically 

Actual Result:
-View fails to respond

Expected Result:
-View scrolls properly

Additional Notes: Works as expected with Ti SDK 3.2.2
Electric Company app is available here: https://www.dropbox.com/s/g0g3ffigsr9nhbp/Electric%20Company.zip
fields.summary: Electric Company - ScrollView with child scrollableView not responding to touches
fields.environment:
Ti SDK: 3.2.3 , 3.3.0
Devices: Samsung S3 (4.3) & Genymotion Nexus 7 (4.2.2)
